data.actual_result: The sidebar (which lists your servers) is in the way, and blocks half of the server and or private message screen
data.expected_result: You are able to see the full screen, any messages, and type without hinderance
data.short_description: When I access discord through my app, and go into a server or private message, the sidebar stays in position, effectivly cutting off half my vision, making it difficult or impossible even to read messages.
data.steps_to_repro: - Log into discord on the app, simple - go to a private message or a server - etc
